10namespace proto::lacte {
11
12using namespace std::string_view_literals;
13#pragma pack(push, 1)
14
15struct RFIDNumberType {
16 explicit RFIDNumberType(uint64_t new_id = 0) {
17 memset(id_.data(), 0, sizeof id_);
18 memcpy(id_.data(), (uint8_t*)&new_id, sizeof id_);
19 }
20 explicit RFIDNumberType(std::string_view text) {
21 // Normalize input: trim spaces and optional separators, detect base
22 std::string str;
23 str.reserve(text.size());
24 for (const char VAL : text) {
25 if (VAL == ' ' || VAL == '\t' || VAL == '\n' || VAL == ':' ||
26 VAL == '-') {
27 continue; // ignore separators
28 }
29 str.push_back(VAL);
30 }
31
32 int base = DEC_BASE;
33 if (str.size() > 2 && (str[0] == '0') && (str[1] == 'x' || str[1] == 'X')) {
34 base = HEX_BASE;
35 } else {
36 // Heuristic: if contains hex letters, treat as hex
37 for (const char VAL : str) {
38 if ((VAL >= 'a' && VAL <= 'f') || (VAL >= 'A' && VAL <= 'F')) {
39 base = HEX_BASE;
40 break;
41 }
42 }
43 }
44
45 // std::stout handles both with/without 0x when base==0, but we choose
46 // explicit base for clarity
47 unsigned long long value = 0;
48 try {
49 size_t idx = 0;
50 value = std::stoull(str, &idx, base);
51 (void)
52 idx; // if idx < s.size(), trailing chars are ignored by design above
53 } catch (...) {
54 value = 0; // fallback to zero on parse failure
55 }
56
57 // Store lower 56 bits in little-endian order to match the uint64_t ctor
58 // behavior
59 std::memset(id_.data(), 0, sizeof id_);
60 const uint64_t V64 = static_cast<uint64_t>(value) & 0x00FFFFFFFFFFFFFFULL;
61 std::memcpy(id_.data(), reinterpret_cast<const uint8_t*>(&V64), sizeof id_);
62 }
63 explicit RFIDNumberType(const std::string& text)
64 : RFIDNumberType(std::string_view{text}) {}
65 constexpr static std::string_view NAME = "RFID"sv;
66 auto operator==(const RFIDNumberType& other) const -> bool {
67 return memcmp(id_.data(), other.id_.data(), sizeof id_) == 0;
68 }
69 auto operator!=(const RFIDNumberType& other) const -> bool {
70 return memcmp(id_.data(), other.id_.data(), sizeof id_) != 0;
71 }
72
73 // вариант 1: явная функция конвертации в строку
74 [[nodiscard]] auto to_string() const -> std::string {
75 std::ostringstream oss;
76 const uint8_t* data = id_.data();
77 uint64_t raw;
78 std::memcpy(&raw, data, sizeof(raw));
79 const uint64_t RESULT = raw & 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFULL;
80
81 oss << RESULT;
82 return oss.str();
83 }
84
85 // вариант 2: оператор преобразования (тогда можно писать (std::string)v)
86 explicit operator std::string()
87 const { // explicit, чтобы не было неявных сюрпризов
88 return to_string();
89 }
90
91 friend auto operator<<(std::ostream& out, const RFIDNumberType& VAL)
92 -> std::ostream& {
93 out << "RFID: ";
94 out << VAL.to_string();
95 return out;
96 // или: return os << "\nRFIDPacket ID: " << v.to_string();
97 }
98
99 private:
100 constexpr static uint8_t DEC_BASE = 10;
101 constexpr static uint8_t HEX_BASE = 16;
102 constexpr static uint8_t ID_LEN = 7;
103 std::array<uint8_t, ID_LEN> id_{};
104};
105
106// вариант 1: явная функция конвертации в строку
107static auto to_string(const RFIDNumberType& rfid) -> std::string {
108 std::ostringstream oss;
109 oss << rfid.to_string();
110 return oss.str();
111}
112
113#pragma pack(pop)

115} // namespace proto::lacte
